Question
========

Using a random sample of n = 100 individuals, we will investigated how many Amsterdammers go to France during the summer vacations. France. In the sample, it turns out to be 20. A 95% confidence interval for the population proportion p then has a margin of error interval that is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.04
* 0.08
* 0.10

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.04: Incorrect
* 0.08: Correct
* 0.10: Incorrect
